summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account activity of Jeffrey Epstein for the month of February 2018. It includes information on account balances, transactions, and service charges, highlighting significant outgoing transfers and the overall financial status of Epstein's account during this period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary individual associated with the account detailed in the financial statement, showing his financial transactions and balances.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: William G Hammond
persons.context: William G Hammond is mentioned as the recipient of a significant outgoing money transfer from Epstein's account.

connections.description: William G Hammond is the recipient of a money transfer from Jeffrey Epstein's account.

events.title: Check Payment
events.description: A check payment of $4,498.80 was made from Jeffrey Epstein's account.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: An outgoing money transfer of $11,745.20 was made to JPMorgan Chase Bank.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document details Jeffrey Epstein's account balance and transactions for February 2018.
The beginning balance of the account was $463,079.08, with an ending balance of $446,833.08.
A significant outgoing transfer of $11,745.20 was made to JPMorgan Chase Bank.
Stewart Oldfield is listed as a contact for inquiries regarding the account.
William G Hammond is noted as a recipient of a check payment from Epstein's account.
